\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the handle is invalid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the handle is not valid; otherwise, false.
